channel.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
channel.description: for the past 2 weeks ive been all over the internet looking for a way to compile on windows 7. I STILL HAVE NOT FOUND ONE SOLUTION THAT WORKS. Every compiler i've tried has either said"compile completed" but it desnt update. or says path not specified. sombody please help, i'm near hoplessness with this. ive already posted like 3 topics on this without help. I dont know what to do and i cant edit my server. Im using (317) btw. delta source

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

[quote=“power of the blood, post:15, topic:360251”]ugh, they both dont work. OMG WAT AM I DOING WRONG!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!!?!? Did i set my enviromental setting right?

EDIT: Hey guys i think i found what i’m doing wrong… I don’t have jdk installed, i have jre installed. I just installed this computer and forgot to add jdk. Hopefully after i install it it will work[/quote]

lmfao, download some jdk bro! xD

Read full topic

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

ugh, they both dont work. OMG WAT AM I DOING WRONG!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!!?!? Did i set my enviromental setting right?

EDIT: Hey guys i think i found what i’m doing wrong… I don’t have jdk installed, i have jre installed. I just installed this computer and forgot to add jdk. Hopefully after i install it it will work

Read full topic

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files (x64)/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

if that doesnt work then re-copy scape-java’s and make the backslash a forward slash just before the jdk.

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

it should be this

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

No errors, nothing. It either says “path not specified”, or “compiled successfully” but it doesnt update. Please help me, idk wht im doing wrong. Ive had this problem forever, and if i cant find a solution i’m gonna be forced to quit rsps becaue i cant edit my source. I love rsps, please help me.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS

item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Well, if you received no building errors or anything then you’re doing something wrong within the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

its still saying path not specified. I have another compiler wich says “compiled successfully”, but doesnt realy update. Idk what wrong with this one either, but here’s the code.

@echo off
color 0a
title Unlimited-pkz Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
:end
echo You have sucsessfully compiled
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Help, can't compile. HOPLESS
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

Okay I set my enviromental settings. Set CLASSPATH, and path like this:

CLASSPATH: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

okay i double clicked compile and it said class not specified… heres the compiler im using

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_13/bin/javac.exe” -d ./bin ./src/*.java
pause

I have java update 21(it automatically updates), and remember im using windows 7. What am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
